scripts.say: GAMBIT SEQUENCE INITIATED. COMMENCE IMMEDIATE DISPOSAL OF THE BACKUP OF THE ORIGINAL.
GAMBIT SEQUENCE INITIATED. COMMENCE IMMEDIATE DISPOSAL OF THE BACKUP OF THE ORIGINAL.
GAMBIT SEQUENCE INITIATED. COMMENCE IMMEDIATE DISPOSAL OF THE BACKUP OF THE ORIGINAL.
Ahahahahaha! This is checkmate for you!
This is amazing! You've gone way beyond the Natural Calculation System's wildest estimates... Humans are amazing creatures!
At this evolutionary speed, if we repeat the Returning War... no, the Planned War, over and over, one day we'll finally have what we need...!
The Judge thinks very highly of your achievements! ...Thanks to you, even a subsystem like me was able to fulfill her duty~!
Now go! Continue down the paTH you beLIEeve in to ITs final DESTINatIon!

sequence: "PlEAse tell mE wE'lL meeT agaIn sOMeDay..."
